articles.author: Naman Agarwal
articles.title: David Warner backs Marcus Harris to replace him as Australia Test opener - Wisden
articles.description: David Warner has backed fellow left-handed opener Marcus Harris to succeed him after he retires from Test cricket. Read more here.
articles.content:
David Warner has backed fellow left-handed opener Marcus Harris to succeed him after he retires from Test cricket.
Warner, who is in the midst of his final Test series, scored 38 runs on day one of … [+2153 chars]
